properties.areaDesc: Northern Valley; Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 7:26PM MST until February 12 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
...Arctic Front Moving In Tonight...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Windchills Wednesday
15 to 30 below.

* WHERE...Daniels, Sheridan, Northern Valley and Eastern
Roosevelt Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 6 PM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and icy road conditions. Patchy
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold
wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Dress in layers
Wednesday.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY
